sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-form ref="form" :model="user" :rules="rules" label-width="120px">
    <el-row>
      <el-col :span="8">
        <el-form-item label="账户" prop="userName">
          <el-input v-model="user.userName" disabled/>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-col>
      <el-col :span="8">

        <el-form-item label="手机号码" prop="phoneNumber">
          <el-input v-model="user.phoneNumber" disabled/>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-col>
      <el-col :span="8">
        <el-form-item label="所属管理公司" prop="companyName">
          <el-input v-model="user.companyName" disabled/>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-col>
    </el-row>

    <el-row>
      <el-col :span="8">
    <el-form-item label="姓名" prop="nickName">
      <el-input v-model="user.nickName" disabled />
    </el-form-item>
      </el-col>
      <el-col :span="8">
    <el-form-item label="邮箱" prop="email">
      <el-input v-model="user.email" disabled maxlength="50"/>
    </el-form-item>
      </el-col>
      <el-col :span="8">
        <el-form-item label="性别">
          <el-radio-group v-model="user.sex" disabled>
            <el-radio label="0">男</el-radio>
            <el-radio label="1">女</el-radio>
          </el-radio-group>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-col>
    </el-row>

    <el-row>
      <el-col :span="8">
    <el-form-item label="认证企业名称" v-if="user.userType==='1'" prop="shipperFullName">
      <el-input v-model="user.shipperFullName" disabled/>
    </el-form-item>
      </el-col>
      <el-col :span="8">
    <el-form-item label="认证企业简称" v-if="user.userType==='1'" prop="shipperShortName">
      <el-input v-model="user.shipperShortName" disabled/>
    </el-form-item>
      </el-col>
      <el-col :span="8">
        <el-form-item label="创建时间" prop="createTime">
          <el-input v-model="user.createTime" disabled/>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-col>
    </el-row>

    <el-form-item>
<!--      <el-button type="primary" size="mini" @click="submit">保存</el-button>-->
      <el-button type="danger" size="mini" @click="close">关闭</el-button>
    </el-form-item>
  </el-form>
</template>

<script>
  import {updateUserProfile} from "@/api/user";

  export default {
    props: {
      user: {
        type: Object
      }
    },
    data() {
      return {
        // 表单校验
        rules: {
          nickName: [
            {required: true, message: "用户昵称不能为空", trigger: "blur"}
          ],
          email: [
            {required: true, message: "邮箱地址不能为空", trigger: "blur"},
            {
              type: "email",
              message: "'请输入正确的邮箱地址",
              trigger: ["blur", "change"]
            }
          ],
          phonenumber: [
            {required: true, message: "手机号码不能为空", trigger: "blur"},
            {
              pattern: /^1[3|4|5|6|7|8|9][0-9]\d{8}$/,
              message: "请输入正确的手机号码",
              trigger: "blur"
            }
          ]
        }
      };
    },
    methods: {
      // submit() {
      //   this.$refs["form"].validate(valid => {
      //     if (valid) {
      //       updateUserProfile(this.user).then(response => {
      //         this.msgSuccess("修改成功");
      //       });
      //     }
      //   });
      // },
      close() {
        this.$store.dispatch("tagsView/delView", this.$route);
        this.$router.push({path: "/index"});
      }
    }
  };
</script>
